tldr: Affected versions of this package use `BinaryFormatter`, a library known to be vulnerable to deserialization of untrusted data. This flaw could potentially lead to Remote Code Execution (RCE) or Denial of Service (DoS) attacks.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `Nuke.Tooling` library to the patch version.
